title: Event
description: An activity that has been scheduled on the calendar.

id.description: The unique id of this event, autogenerated in the database.

eventTypeId.description: The unique id of the related event type.

beginDttm.description: The date and time the event begins (ISO 8601, section 5.6, UTC), milliseconds optional.

endDttm.description: The date and time the event ends (ISO 8601, section 5.6, UTC), milliseconds optional.

timeZone.description: The timezone of the event begin and end times.

peopleNeeded.description: The number of people needed to staff the event fully.

comment.example: On this date, we will be deep-cleaning the walk-in.

updateUser.description: The username of the person who last updated this event.

updateDttm.description: Epoch timestamp (number of seconds from 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z) for when the event was updated.
